summary: Base class that defines the common structure and behavior for bundle workflows, supporting training, inference or evaluation modes. It validates the workflow type, loads metadata and property files, configures logging, and provides lifecycle hooks (initialize, run, finalize) together with generic property accessors.
business_intent: Provide a reusable foundation that standardizes configuration, initialization, execution, and finalization of different workflow types, enabling consistent handling of metadata, properties, and logging while allowing specific training or inference implementations to focus on core logic.
